com.amfontai.cmput301asn1

Class WordCloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.amfontai.cmput301asn1.WordCloud

  • public class WordCloud
extends Activity
    The Class WordCloud represents the andorid.app.Activity containing a word cloud created with org.mcavallo.opencloud. It uses a WebView, which is defined in activity_word_cloud.xml

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      private NotesDb mDb
      mDb is an instance of (@link NotesDb}, which controls access to the SQLiteDatabase.
